content: glitter materials one ball athena by needlful yarns 50 gm 92 m one ball opulence by estelle 50 gm 100 m size 9mm crochet hook gauge two pattern repeats are 10 cm long one strand of each yarn worked together finished size finished scarf approximately 130 cm long 10 cm wide chain 14 row 1 wrong side double_crochet in sixth chain from hook and in each chain across 9dc row 2 chain 5 turn double_crochet in back loop only of first double_crochet ÿ chain 1 skip next double_crochet double_crochet in back loop only of next double_crochet repeat from ÿ 3 times more 5 double_crochet row 3 chain 5 turn double_crochet in front loop only in first double_crochet and in each chain 1 space and each double_crochet across 9 double_crochet repeat row 2 and 3 for desired length ending by working row 3 sew in ends steam enjoy monika stramaglia 2006 all rights reserved strictly no photocopy allowed all copies are originals by monika stramaglia accept no copies bevwood@rogers com
